isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES FS-5106 AND FS-6206 - REASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Install the plunger and washer as shown ( Figure 63) and install reverse plunger springs (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 63. Install Plunger, Washer, and Reverse Plunger Springs

step1.para: Depress reverse plunger retainer and springs and install the snap ring in the groove of the shift block ( Figure 64).

figure.caption: Figure 64. Install Snap Ring in Groove of Shift Block

step1.para: Install the interlock balls, detent balls and springs in the following sequence: position (3) balls in the reverse light switch bore and install reverse detent spring and ball ( Figure 65). Position (2) balls in adjacent cross bore and install 1st and 2nd detent spring and ball. Position (2) balls in adjacent cross bore and install 3rd and 4th detent spring and ball. Position (2) balls in adjacent cross bore and install 5th and 6th detent spring and ball.

figure.caption: Figure 65. Install Interlock Balls, Detent Balls and Springs in Sequence

note.para: Balls and springs can be used interchangeably.

step1.para: Position reverse yoke in housing assembly as shown ( Figure 66).

figure.caption: Figure 66. Position Reverse Yoke in Housing Assembly

step1.para: Install interlock pin in 1st-2nd yoke assembly and position as shown ( Figure 67).

figure.caption: Figure 67. Install Interlock Pin in 1st-2nd Yoke Assembly

step1.para: Install interlock pin in 3rd-4th yoke assembly and position as shown ( Figure 68).

figure.caption: Figure 68. Install Interlock Pin in 3rd-4th Yoke Assembly

step1.para: Position 5th-6th yoke assembly in housing as shown ( Figure 69).

figure.caption: Figure 69. Position 5th-6th Yoke Assembly in Housing

note.para: The shift yoke retainer bolt holes are not tapped on new shifter housing. The bolts that are used are "thread forming" and can be re-used if the shifter housing is replaced.

step1.para: Position shift yoke as shown ( Figure 70). Install front retainer over shift rails and install front (2) bolts.

figure.caption: Figure 70. Position Shift Yoke and Install Front Retainer Over Shift Rails

note.para: It may be necessary to support rails in the proper position while installing rail supports.

step1.para: Position shift yokes as shown and install center retainer and bolts ( Figure 71).

figure.caption: Figure 71. Position Shift Yokes and Install Center Retainer and Bolts

step1.para: Position rear retainer over shift rails and install bolts ( Figure 72).

figure.caption: Figure 72. Position Rear Retainer Over Shift Rails

step1.para: Slide 5th-6th shift yoke into 5th position (inset, Figure 73) and install remaining 2 bolts. Return 5th-6th yoke to neutral position. Tighten all retainer bolts to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N · m).

figure.caption: Figure 73. Slide 5th-6th Yoke into Position and Install Bolts
